example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <Stack spacing="tight">
      <Heading as="h3" type="title3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <Stack direction="row">
        <Seat size="small" />
        <Seat size="small" />
        <Seat size="small" />
        <Seat size="small" />
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
    <Stack spacing="tight">
      <Heading as="h3" type="title3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <Stack direction="row">
        <Seat />
        <Seat />
        <Seat />
        <Seat />
      </Stack>
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Seats can be either small or medium (the default).
